summary: A young man finds himself attracted to a cold and unfeeling waitress who may ultimately destroy them both.
cast: Leslie Howard|Bette Davis|Frances Dee|Kay Johnson|Reginald Denny|Alan Hale|Reginald Sheffield|Reginald Owen|Desmond Roberts|Charles Coleman|Frank Mills|Pat Somerset|Harry Allen|Ray Atchley|Frank Baker|Evelyn Beresford|Jimmy Casey|Ma Curly|Byron Fitzpatrick|Douglas Gordon|Frankie Grandetta|Tommy Hughes|Kenner G. Kemp|Billy Mills|Nat Neahan|Tempe Pigott|Irene Rich|Adrian Rosley|Frank Schwab|Al Sullivan|Madeline Wilson
title: Cautivo del deseo
